ListTickets.request_vtl:
#set($external_id = $input.params("external_id"))
{
  "query": "query MyQuery {
  ListTickets(external_id: $external_id) {
    tickets {
allow_attachments,
  allow_channelback,
  assignee_email,
  assignee_id,
  attribute_value_ids,
  brand_id,
  collaborator_ids,
  collaborators {
email,
    name
 
  },
  created_at,
  custom_fields {
id,
    value
 
  },
  custom_status_id,
  description,
  due_at,
  email_cc_ids,
  external_id,
  follower_ids,
  followup_ids,
  forum_topic_id,
  from_messaging_channel,
  group_id,
  has_incidents,
  id,
  is_public,
  macro_id,
  macro_ids,
  organization_id,
  priority,
  problem_id,
  raw_subject,
  recipient,
  requester_id,
  safe_update,
  sharing_agreement_ids,
  status,
  subject,
  submitter_id,
  tags,
  ticket_form_id,
  type,
  updated_at,
  updated_stamp,
  url,
  via {
channel
 
  },
  via_followup_source_id,
  via_id
}
  }
}",
  "variables": null,
  "operationName": "MyQuery"
}

UpdateTicket.request_vtl:
#set($ticket_id = $input.params("ticket_id"))
{
  "query": "mutation MyMutation {
  UpdateTicket(ticket_id: $ticket_id) {
    audit {
author_id,
  created_at,
  events {
body,
    field_name,
    id,
    type,
    value
 
  },
  id,
  ticket_id,
  via {
channel,
    source {
from {
address,
        id,
        name,
        title
     
  },
      rel,
      to {
address,
        name
     
  }
   
  }
 
  }
},
ticket {
allow_attachments,
  allow_channelback,
  assignee_email,
  assignee_id,
  attribute_value_ids,
  brand_id,
  collaborator_ids,
  collaborators {
email,
    name
 
  },
  created_at,
  custom_fields {
id,
    value
 
  },
  custom_status_id,
  description,
  due_at,
  email_cc_ids,
  external_id,
  follower_ids,
  followup_ids,
  forum_topic_id,
  from_messaging_channel,
  group_id,
  has_incidents,
  id,
  is_public,
  macro_id,
  macro_ids,
  organization_id,
  priority,
  problem_id,
  raw_subject,
  recipient,
  requester_id,
  safe_update,
  sharing_agreement_ids,
  status,
  subject,
  submitter_id,
  tags,
  ticket_form_id,
  type,
  updated_at,
  updated_stamp,
  url,
  via {
channel
 
  },
  via_followup_source_id,
  via_id
}
  }
}",
  "variables": null,
  "operationName": "MyMutation"
}
